references.paper_title: Posenet: A convolutional network for real-time 6-dof camera relocalization
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of Absolute Pose Regression (APR), a fundamental technique addressed in the current paper.
This foundational paper introduced the Transformer architecture, which is the basis for the MSTransformer model discussed and improved upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: Extending absolute pose regression to multiple scenes
references.reason: This paper introduced Multi-Scene Absolute Pose Regression (MS-APR), which is directly addressed by the current paper, providing critical context and background.

references.paper_title: Learning multi-scene absolute pose regression with transformers
references.reason: This paper introduced the MSTransformer model, which is extensively analyzed and improved in the current paper, making it a key foundational work.

references.paper_title: Attention is not all you need: Pure attention loses rank doubly exponentially with depth
references.reason: This paper highlights limitations of self-attention mechanisms in transformers, a key problem that the current paper addresses and solves within the context of MS-APR.
